channel.title: How do i make items appear on the ground when dropped [PI] 317
channel.description: hello, everytime i drop an item in my server it says "as your item touches the ground it dissappears". I have looked around and people say that this is a good thing because it fixes the drop dupe. Well i dont really care about the drop dupe and i want to be able to drop items for a drop party. Also i think my monsters arent able to drop the items they are supposed to beacuse of this please help!!! =] i will rep you ++ if you help me =]

item.title: How do i make items appear on the ground when dropped [PI] 317
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

pildurass:

hello, everytime i drop an item in my server it says “as your item touches the ground it dissappears”. I have looked around and people say that this is a good thing because it fixes the drop dupe. Well i dont really care about the drop dupe and i want to be able to drop items for a drop party. Also i think my monsters arent able to drop the items they are supposed to beacuse of this please help!!! =]

Search for the the string “as your item touches the ground it disappears” in all of your source files. Then when you find it, discern under what conditions it prints the message. Then adjust the conditions to fit your needs.

Read full topic
